data.title: Hisotry log - which user created a sub address

qas.question: Hi All I would like to see which user created a sub address on a business partner Please can some advise on how to query this. Which table do I query for this information? Thank you

answers.text: Hi, Modify below query as per your requirement: SELECT SELECT T2.[CardCode], T2.[CardName],T2.[GroupNum] as Newvalue, T2.[CardCode], T2.[CardName],T2.[GroupNum] as Newvalue, T2.[GroupNum] as Newvalue, T1.[GroupNum] as Oldvalue, T3.[U_NAME] as UpdatedUser , T4.[U_NAME] T1.[GroupNum] as Oldvalue, T3.[U_NAME] as UpdatedUser , T4.[U_NAME] T1.[GroupNum] as Oldvalue as CreatedUser FROM ACRD T0 left join ACRD T1 on t0.[CardCode] = as CreatedUser FROM ACRD T0 left join ACRD T1 on t0.[CardCode] = T1.[CardCode] and t0.loginstanc = t1.loginstanc-1 left JOIN OCRD T2 T1.[CardCode] and t0.loginstanc = t1.loginstanc-1 left JOIN OCRD T2 ON T0.cardcode = T2.CardCode left join OUSR T3 on t3.userid = ON T0.cardcode = T2.CardCode left join OUSR T3 on t3.userid = t0.usersign2 left JOIN OUSR T4 ON T4.USERID = T1.userSign left t0.usersign2 left JOIN OUSR T4 ON T4.USERID = T1.userSign left JOIN OCTG T5 ON T0.GroupNum = T5.GroupNum WHERE T2.[GroupNum] <> JOIN OCTG T5 ON T0.GroupNum = T5.GroupNum WHERE T2.[GroupNum] <> T1.[GroupNum] and datediff(dd, T1.[updateDate] ,getdate())<=0 T1.[GroupNum] and datediff(dd, T1.[updateDate] ,getdate())<=0 GROUP BY T2.[CardCode], T2.[CardName], T2.[GroupNum], T1.[GroupNum] , GROUP BY T2.[CardCode], T2.[CardName], T2.[GroupNum], T1.[GroupNum] , T3.[U_NAME] , T4.[U_NAME] T3.[U_NAME] , T4.[U_NAME] Thanks Thanks

data.title: Source determination of agreement which used SC vendor.

qas.question: Need to deliver to vendor B when purchasing one item on agreement 4601001470 from vendor A. The user tried ticking the SC vendor checkbox on the delivery tab for each item in the agreement and also entered vendor B. This did not work. When the tickbox is checked and SC vendor number entered the agreement details do not autopopulate into the requisition. It is also then not possible to manually assign the source of supply in the requisition. we can't get source determination to work on this material, even though the contract and source list looks OK. If anybody have solution,Please help me.Thanks.

answers.text: Have you done PIR on Subcontract Info category for Vendor B.? Check Source list for Vendor B maintiaed or not. Try 1 : Give the Vendor B ( Subcontractor ) In te out line document by following the path Seelct the line in O.A go to Item - > more function - > Delivery Address, you will get the pop up, where you can maintain the Subcontact vendor with tick. Try 2 : By fixing the vendor in SOuce list Let me know if still problem is there.?

data.title: pricing updates depend on which date

qas.question: dear all price updates depend on which date. required delievry date i think but if i m changing the required delivery date what ll be the effect to others.

answers.text: Hi Subu, Yes your thinking is correct the price will be updated for the open orders based on the required delivery date. For newly creating orders system will pick the new price or changed price automatically. If you change required delivery I hope it will not effect others any way you are going to delever the open items in the future only. Recently we have changed the CST from 3% to 2% to get this updation in the open order we have changed the Required delivery date to this month. I hope it will help you, Regards, Murali.

data.title: Which parameters influence the calculation of Requested Delivery Date  ?

qas.question: Hi All , Which parameters influence the calculation of Requested Delivery Date in Sales Order ? Actually i checked the Tcode VOV8 and found the lead time as ZERO and the indicator " Propose Del date " is also set. Inspite of this for a particular plant the lead time is taken as 3 days and system proposes the Req.Del Data as 3 days from today. Let me know where is relevant config or where is it maintained. Regards Ramesh Ch Edited by: RAMESH CH on Dec 10, 2009 12:23 PM

answers.text: As mentioned, if Lead time in days mentioned in doc type details, then system takes priority from the sales doc type & isses RDD in SO, if this field is maintained blank & "Propose Delivery date" is marked , then current/Creation date will be set as RDD, but the confirmed delivery date calculation starts when actual RDD is determined which may impact the lead time in MMR , transit duration from the Route , factory calender etc..,

data.title: Which table field stored the exchange rate for controlling documents?

qas.question: Hi, May i know which table field stores the exchange rate used for a controlling document?

answers.text: Hi, The exchange rate is not specifically stored in CO. In table COEP, the data in transaction currency, object currency and controlling Area currency is stored. You can derive the exchange rate from here. Rgds Shivram.

data.title: Which framework do you suggest to develop an add-on for SAP Business One?

qas.question: Hi, I'm looking for a a framework C# that enables rapid addon development for SAP Business One and helps to enhance feature like versioning, future upgrading (code and db), logging, internationalization and localization, etc. I sawDoverandITCO-SBO-Addon-Framework, but both do not seem to have a very active community, so do you have another one to suggest? Dover ITCO-SBO-Addon-Framework Thanks Gianni

answers.text: There are several frameworks, but as you mentioned, the issue is the lack of activity around it.When I speak with partners, their reason is mainly to not rely their solution on top of a code that they don't know who will maintain (and normally don't want to fix problems themselves)I followed the development of Dover and particularly know the developer. If I had to choose, that will be the one. I also know some solutions that are developed on top of it. And seem to work quite well.

data.title: which method is better to define the planning plant

qas.question: Dear PM Guru's i have one issue in PM implementation project, physically plant is one and they manufacturing the three different products and each product is dependent on other product. As per client business requirement, in MM module they create the 7 plants as logistic plants. So automatically 7 maintenance planning plants or maintenance plants are created when plant is created. In this industry basically three different units, 1. Spinning, (for this unit Spinning maintenance department is separate) 2. Fabric Preparation (Weaving Unit) for this Weaving Maintenance Department separate and 3. is Processing unit. for these three units three Production maintenance teams are separate and One Electrical department for these three units and One Common Utilities team for these three units. Electrical & Utilities maintenance planning is done at central wise and rest of production maintenance is done at individual plant wise. Client asking the Department Vs Plant specific costing report. My Electrical operation & Utilities operations are common for all the three units, how i can assign these electrical and mechanical planner groups? If i made one planning plant, then it is very good for electrical and mechanical but its not suitable for Rest of three units. If i made individual planning plant how i can assign the electrical & utilities planning group. So i am requesting you please suggest the good method to define the PM organization structure. If i made the one planning plant then my entire MIS reporting structure is depends on planning plant and planner group and every time i need to select the maintenance plant and some other reporting fields. thanks in advance to all the PM experts.

answers.text: You go with different Planning Plant. Even though Electrical & Utilities are common across the plants, you can create multiple Electrical & Utilities planner groups & assign to different plants. In the reports, if you want to see Electrical or Utilities together, you can select all Planner groups. If you want to be specific, then you can go with any one Planner group.

data.title: Cancel a salesorder which is linked to a delivery

qas.question: Hello, I am a novice in SB1 with a tricky issue for me. I would be glad to be helped ! Indeed, I want to know how to cancel a salesorder which is already linked to a delivery. (If the salesorder is not linked to any document, it's ok I juste cancel it). I ask this question because the consequence is that my turnover is affected by the the salesorder that I don't manage to cancel when I use the sale analysis query available in SB1. For the moment, I designed a User area but I would like to find a better way Regards, And thank you for this forum where I learn many things

answers.text: If the sales order is already linked to a delivery, it means the order has already been executed and now can't be cancelled. The status of the order would be 'closed'. If the order has been partially fulfilled, the status of the order would be 'open', but since a part of it has been executed, you can't cancel it. To close it, you have to manually close the document.

data.title: Need to know the Customer which has not yet made any Transcation

qas.question: Hi experts Am having around 25000 Customers in my System, in which only some are Active and having transaction now i need to clean up my system, for that i need a query, which shows me the List of Customers who has not yet done any transactions till now so that i can remove it from the system Am using sap 9.1 Version Regards

answers.text: Hi, this query will help you in identifying the customer with 0 balance. SELECT T0.[CardCode], T0.[CardName], T0.[CardType], T0.[Balance] FROM OCRD T0 where t0.cardtype = 'C' AND T0.BALANCE = 0 the below query will help u in identifying the customers who don't have any journal transactions. select cardcode, cardname from ocrd where cardcode not in( select c.cardcode from jdt1 b inner join ocrd c on b.shortname = c.cardcode) and cardtype = 'C' Regards, Vinoth

data.title: Special G/L Indicator: which customizing steps to set them?

qas.question: Hi All, could anyone show me the customizing steps for Special G/L Indicators? Thanks Gandalf

answers.text: Execute T Code FBKP and click on Special G/L. In the following screen, click on Create (F6) button and configure Special G/L indicators for account type D (Customer) and/or K (Vendor) as required. Specify the recon. account assigned to customer/vendor master data and the alternate recon. account to which the general ledger posting should go to. Create master data of the alternate recon account. In FB01, etc., use posting key 09/19 for customers and 29/39 for vendors so you could post with the special GL indicators created.

data.title: How to find table about users which contains fields: User, First and last name, Department?

qas.question: Hello, How to find table about users which contains fields: User, First and last name, Department? I tried using tables USR1, USR2, USR3 but I can't combine these columnes together because I am always missing column User or Department etc. This is what I need: User First name Last name DepartmentJackW Jack Welch Management Any help is appreciated! Thanks,Sam

answers.text: Hi sam, To obtain the data that youre asking you need to join the following tables: USR21 - ADRP - ADCP These tables has all the fields that you need: USR21: has the username ADRP: has the first and last name ADCP: has the department field Regards, Mariano.

answers.text: Hi Parag, Auto Reservations can not be change manually.So if you want to close that reservation without changing the order status TECO, then activate Final Issue indicator for all all Components in Process Order Material Screen. Regards, Dhaval

data.title: which location is modified by snote,spam,sum?

qas.question: Hi SAP Experts, When we modify system using snote,spam,sum, they modify the data in database or the kernel data on OS file system? Best Regards szw

answers.text: SPAM and SNOTE both update ABAP Code and Data Dictionary objects within the Database. The SAP update manager supports more complex changes to the system. This includes Support Package Stacks and Enhancement packages, as well as Upgrades. In the case that a new kernel is required (eg. Upgrade, SP-STACK) then the new kernel will be deployed to the relevant OS filesystem. A high level description of SUM is available atSUM for ABAP - Troubleshooting Guide - Software Logistics - SCN Wiki . SUM for ABAP - Troubleshooting Guide - Software Logistics - SCN Wiki . You can reference SAP note 19466 (http://service.sap.com/sap/support/notes/19466) which describes the kernel patch process. This includes the location on the file system that the kernel is stored. You can reference SAP note 19466 (http://service.sap.com/sap/support/notes/19466) which describes the kernel patch process. This includes the location on the file system that the kernel is stored. http://service.sap.com/sap/support/notes/19466

answers.text: Dear Hoo Laa, It is not possible to get the Time for newly created PR But for the Changed PR. Whenever u change the PR , U get the Change time for the PR.And this is required for Business process also instead of PR created time. Go for table CDHDR. Enter TCODE= 'ME53N' and execute.(Not ME51N) Rewards...If useful Regards Sanjay L

data.title: Weight unit issue in sales order which is being pulled from material master

qas.question: Hello Everybody, Since we purchase all our materials in quantity (EA) and weight unit in grams (G) from our parent company in Asia (Metric system) all the materials wt. unit is maintained in Grms(G) in the dimesions field in basic data tab in material master. But our customers are in US and needs everything in Pounds (LB). I am SD guy and not much into materials, but I did some leg work and know that it has something to be with base unit of measure, alternative unit in additional tab. But my confusion is as following: we have base unit of measure as - EA (in basic data tab) and Wt. unit as G in dimensions. note: we also sometime use alternative unit as I box = 10 EA, and 1 Case = 200 Ea which is maintained in additional tab. Now what we want is ., if we create a sales order for 1 quantity, or 1 box, or 1 case then the Wt. should be in LB. But when we purchase material from Asia, we want to get it in grams and maintained in grms in stock with us. But our all Wm reporting and outgoing deliveries(856) invoice(8100 shld have LB. My try: My try: base unit of measure: EA wt. unit: G Sales unit: LB Order unit: G additional data tab conversions : 1 EA each <=> 1 EA 35.380 G g <=> 1 EA 77.930 LB US pound <=> 1 EA 1 PAC Pack <=> 10 EA 1 CV Case <=> 200 EA But still in the order I am getting G. All the guru's please help me out. Thanks in advance and answers will get good points. Cheers, SAPcontributor.

answers.text: hi, you have to transform the unit in an userexit of the order fron g to lbs. The right place is MV45AFZZ User-Exit USEREXIT_MOVE_FIELD_TO_VBAP. In MAAPV you habe the material data. Try it out, if you have only to change the unit in maapv or if the copy from maapv tp vbap ist alre4ady done. If done change the unit at this place ( and change the weight to the new value ) . This coding, you can do in dependence of your vkorg or werks or auart. hans

data.title: Which BAPI to use for Quotation?

qas.question: I found 2 FM in SAP. BAPI_QUOTATION_CREATEFROMDATA and BAPI_QUOTATION_CREATEFROMDATA2. Which is the latest and which is a better option for me? I find BAPI BAPI_QUOTATION_CREATEFROMDATA is simplier. Can someone advice. Thanks Bye Colin

answers.text: I Hi Colin BAPI_QUOTATION_CREATEFROMDATA its easy to give few input parameters required while quotation creation MPORTING *" VALUE(ORDER_HEADER_IN) LIKE BAPISDHEAD *" STRUCTURE BAPISDHEAD *" VALUE(WITHOUT_COMMIT) LIKE BAPI_STAND-NO_COMMIT *" DEFAULT SPACE *" VALUE(CONVERT_PARVW_AUART) LIKE BAPIFLAG-BAPIFLAG *" DEFAULT SPACE *" EXPORTING *" VALUE(SALESDOCUMENT) LIKE BAPIVBELN-VBELN *" VALUE(SOLD_TO_PARTY) LIKE BAPISOLDTO *" STRUCTURE BAPISOLDTO *" VALUE(SHIP_TO_PARTY) LIKE BAPISHIPTO *" STRUCTURE BAPISHIPTO *" VALUE(BILLING_PARTY) LIKE BAPIPAYER *" STRUCTURE BAPIPAYER *" VALUE(RETURN) LIKE BAPIRETURN1 STRUCTURE BAPIRETURN And wher as BAPI_QUOTATION_CREATEFROMDATA2 More input parameters required to create quotation with new release IMPORTING *" VALUE(SALESDOCUMENTIN) LIKE BAPIVBELN-VBELN OPTIONAL *" VALUE(QUOTATION_HEADER_IN) LIKE BAPISDHD1 STRUCTURE BAPISDHD1 *" VALUE(QUOTATION_HEADER_INX) LIKE BAPISDHD1X STRUCTURE *" BAPISDHD1X OPTIONAL *" VALUE(SENDER) LIKE BAPI_SENDER STRUCTURE BAPI_SENDER OPTIONAL *" VALUE(BINARY_RELATIONSHIPTYPE) LIKE BAPIRELTYPE-RELTYPE DEFAULT *" SPACE *" VALUE(INT_NUMBER_ASSIGNMENT) LIKE BAPIFLAG-BAPIFLAG DEFAULT *" SPACE *" VALUE(BEHAVE_WHEN_ERROR) LIKE BAPIFLAG-BAPIFLAG DEFAULT SPACE *" VALUE(LOGIC_SWITCH) LIKE BAPISDLS STRUCTURE BAPISDLS OPTIONAL *" VALUE(TESTRUN) LIKE BAPIFLAG-BAPIFLAG OPTIONAL *" VALUE(CONVERT) LIKE BAPIFLAG-BAPIFLAG DEFAULT SPAC Regards, Seegal

answers.text: Look if you can use OA81. I don't think it is possible you want. I write up is only an asset posting and will be posted in the depreciation run Acquisition and Retirement create in most cases direct a posting in FI

data.title: in which scenario sales order costing is needed ?

qas.question: Is it mandatory to have every time for a sales order to have sales order costing? is it mandatory to have SO costing in MTO scenerios always? in which scenerio SO costing is not applicable in MTO scenerio ?

answers.text: Sale order costing will be used only when you do not know the actual cost of product since the customer may ask for a product mix or custom product. in sap we have configurable material which will allow customer to pick and chose what he wants. e.g. laptop with different customsing options like hark disk capacity, processor... etc. in this case we need to use sale order costing to arrive at the cost, since each variant will have different raw material used. hope this helps. regards sarvan

data.title: How can we find the Idoc number which posts the material document in SAP

qas.question: Hi All, How can we find the Idoc number which posts the material document in SAP. We could not able to find the IDOC number from the material document which was posted by Idoc. Thanks Chandru

answers.text: Hi, In MIGO you can go to service of object(Just above show overview) and check 5th option workflow you will find the idoc number. regards suresh

data.title: In which ways is side by side extensiblity in public cloud limited?

qas.question: SAP S/4HANA Cloud ABAP Environment (Embedded Steampunk)] - In which ways is side by side extensiblity in public cloud limited in comparison to what we can do in private edition?

answers.text: You can use BTP for side by side without any constraints. Only issue is using the SAP released apis and without modifications

data.title: Determining which SAP Notes are required

qas.question: Good morning recipient, To comply with Portugal's regulations our company would like to implement the QR-code and ATCUD code on the delivery note. As I'm quite new to the use of SAP Notes I was wondering how one would determine which SAP Notes are required to implement this functionality. I've already found the SAP Notes related to SD Outbound Delivery Adaptations, but I'm still quite confused on how we, as a company, should determine which of these SAP Notes need to be implemented. I look forward to your response. Kind regards

answers.text: No accepted solution found

data.title: Which SAP module to recommend ?

qas.question: Hello Friends, My friend has 3 years of Pricing experience having worked for a credit card company and would like to become a SAP functional consultant. Please could you advise which SAP module (s) is suitable for her profile? Thanking you in advance. Best regards John

answers.text: Hi, in put Pricing alone will not sufficient- What is his education? in SAP- Pricing will be integration of SD-FI or MM -FI If he is familiar with Fi-co processes then it is prefer SAP-FI Thanks Chidambaram

data.title: Can we reverse the Internal order settlement  after clossing that posting period, in which it was settled?

qas.question: Hi All user had settledinternal order in period 05, now that period is closed butuser want to reverse that internal order in period 07 without open the period 05. user want to reverse that internal order in period 07 without open the period 05 i tried by T-code (KO88)-->menu--> settlement--> Reverse. But system not do the needful.Please suggest

answers.text: Hi Rohit It's needed open the period 05 for run reversal internal order, Tcode OKP2, or you may transfer the costs through Tcode: KB11N, from an internal order to another. Best Regards Jandoval Nascimento.

data.title: which report I can use ?

qas.question: Which report I can use for 1. total purchase value for a period 2.Material with standard unit price and unit price. 3. Material inventory with project

answers.text: 1. total purchase value for a period =ME81N, MCE1, MCE3, 7 2.Material with standard unit price and unit price.= MM60 3. Material inventory with project=MBBS, MB52 with Project stock indicator

data.title: COE#DE01 - Please can you also confirm in which CDS views we can find the following fields

qas.question: fields-as-they-appear-in-the-event-based-revenue-r.png fields-as-they-appear-in-the-event-based-revenue-r.png Good day,Please can you confirm in which CDS views we can find the fields below:- "Sales Deduction /Surcharge"- "Last evaluation per"- "Processing Status"- "Billing Element Desc"I have also attached a screenshot of the fields as they appear in the "Event-Based Revenue Recognition" application. This is asked for because we are building a Custom Embedded report.Regards,Keith

answers.text: Hi Keith, Could you please check C_EvtBsdRevnRecgnProjMonitor or C_Trrmonitor Best Regards,Owen

data.title: which db table stores inv.program position ?

qas.question: Hello guys, Which database table stores the info about wbs element assignment to inv.program position ? Thanks guys ! Laimonas

answers.text: Not sure but check out below table, IMPR : IMPR-OBJNR IMZO : IMZO- OBJNR You can also use standard IM Reports. WIth Regards Nitin P.

data.title: How to  restrict the IP which can connect to SAP S/4 HANA Cloud URL

qas.question: Hello expert， For more security，our company wants to restrict the IP which can connect to SAP S/4 HANA Cloud URL. For example, we just want IP A or B can connect and access SAP S/4 HANA Cloud URL, the other IPs should be forbidden to connect and access SAP S/4 HANA Cloud URL. Becasue it is SaaS mode, we can't do the access control policy inside our compony using the network devices. So we are dying to know if there is any way we can do in the SAP S/4 HANA Cloud. Thanks.

answers.text: No accepted solution found

data.title: Free Samples which are excisable.?

qas.question: Hi friends, Some time we need to issue free samples to our clients : 1) Create a BP u2013 Free Samples 2) Create Sales Order (Separate order series for Free Samples 3) Create delivery of the frees sample 4) Pass Outgoing Excise invoice based on Delivery 5) Close the Delivery manually/Forcefully 6) Pass JV for closing the Open Excise transaction Whether this is OK ? In this case, we will not come to know about the Quantity /value of Frees sample issued during the year. Suppose we want to capture the quantity & amount of the cost which is related to Free Samples, than whether any other procedure needs to be adopted ? Regards, Mahesh

answers.text: Hi! The process is fine for Free Samples. if, u want any Details like, what is the Expense incourred for Free Samples, u write Query reports.
